CONFIDENT.Definition: sure about your skills and abilities

FLUENT.Definition: able to speak easily and well

BUFFET.Definition: meal where people serve themselves different types of food

SUBCONSCIOUS.Definition: existing or operating in the mind without us knowing it

DUH.Definition: used to comment on a foolish or obvious statement or opinion

BEAR WITH ME.Definition: remain patient and continue paying attention

FIT THEM IN.Definition: include them, do them at the same time

CONSONANTS.Definition: speech sounds that are made when the air is stopped from moving easily through the mouth

INTONATION.Definition: the sound changes produced by the rise and fall of the voice which affects a whole sentence and its meaning

CRITICALLY.Definition: in a way that involves attention and judgement

EXCEL.Definition: perform in a great way, are excellent

HARPOON.Definition: the weapon that was used to hunt whales, a kind of spear

IN CONTEXT.Definition: considered together with the surrounding words, as a part of a sentence

CLAUSE.Definition: a group of words consisting of a subject and a verb

SIGNIFICANTLY.Definition: a lot, by a large amount

TICKING THEM OFF.Definition: they are marked with a tick (✓) to show that they have been used

AT BEST.Definition: even if the best possible result happens

PROMPT.Definition: something that serves as a suggestion or reminder

SUMMARY.Definition: a short description that gives the main points

PERSPECTIVES.Definition: views, ways of thinking about something

TIMER.Definition: device that makes a sound when a particular period of time has gone past

POINT OUT.Definition: say it in order for you to know about it

POLYGLOT.Definition: a person who speaks several different languages

COUNTERINTUITIVELY.Definition: contrary to what one would expect

ONE-OF-A-KIND.Definition: the only episode of this kind
